name: xcodemcp_xcode_open_project
description: Open an Xcode project or workspace

xcodeproj.description: Absolute path to the .xcodeproj file (or .xcworkspace if available) - e.g., /path/to/project.xcodeproj

name: xcodemcp_xcode_close_project
description: Close the currently active Xcode project or workspace (automatically stops any running actions first)

xcodeproj.description: Absolute path to the .xcodeproj file (or .xcworkspace if available) - e.g., /path/to/project.xcodeproj

name: xcodemcp_xcode_build
description: Build a specific Xcode project or workspace with the specified scheme. If destination is not provided, uses the currently active destination.

xcodeproj.description: Absolute path to the .xcodeproj file to build (or .xcworkspace if available) - e.g., /path/to/project.xcodeproj

scheme.description: Name of the scheme to build

destination.description: Build destination (optional - uses active destination if not provided)

name: xcodemcp_xcode_get_schemes
description: Get list of available schemes for a specific project

xcodeproj.description: Absolute path to the .xcodeproj file (or .xcworkspace if available) - e.g., /path/to/project.xcodeproj

name: xcodemcp_xcode_set_active_scheme
description: Set the active scheme for a specific project

xcodeproj.description: Absolute path to the .xcodeproj file (or .xcworkspace if available) - e.g., /path/to/project.xcodeproj

schemeName.description: Name of the scheme to activate

name: xcodemcp_xcode_clean
description: Clean the build directory for a specific project

xcodeproj.description: Absolute path to the .xcodeproj file (or .xcworkspace if available) - e.g., /path/to/project.xcodeproj

name: xcodemcp_xcode_test
description: Run tests for a specific project

xcodeproj.description: Absolute path to the .xcodeproj file (or .xcworkspace if available) - e.g., /path/to/project.xcodeproj

name: xcodemcp_xcode_run
description: Run a specific project with the specified scheme

xcodeproj.description: Absolute path to the .xcodeproj file (or .xcworkspace if available) - e.g., /path/to/project.xcodeproj

scheme.description: Name of the scheme to run

name: xcodemcp_xcode_debug
description: Start debugging session for a specific project

xcodeproj.description: Absolute path to the .xcodeproj file (or .xcworkspace if available) - e.g., /path/to/project.xcodeproj

name: xcodemcp_xcode_stop
description: Stop the current scheme action

name: xcodemcp_find_xcresults
description: Find all XCResult files for a specific project with timestamps and file information

xcodeproj.description: Absolute path to the .xcodeproj file (or .xcworkspace if available) - e.g., /path/to/project.xcodeproj

name: xcodemcp_xcode_get_run_destinations
description: Get list of available run destinations for a specific project

xcodeproj.description: Absolute path to the .xcodeproj file (or .xcworkspace if available) - e.g., /path/to/project.xcodeproj

name: xcodemcp_xcode_get_workspace_info
description: Get information about a specific workspace

xcodeproj.description: Absolute path to the .xcodeproj file (or .xcworkspace if available) - e.g., /path/to/project.xcodeproj

name: xcodemcp_xcode_get_projects
description: Get list of projects in a specific workspace

xcodeproj.description: Absolute path to the .xcodeproj file (or .xcworkspace if available) - e.g., /path/to/project.xcodeproj

name: xcodemcp_xcode_open_file
description: Open a file in Xcode

filePath.description: Absolute path to the file to open

lineNumber.description: Optional line number to navigate to

name: xcodemcp_xcode_health_check
description: Perform a comprehensive health check of the XcodeMCP environment and configuration

name: xcodemcp_xcresult_browse
description: Browse XCResult files - list all tests or show details for a specific test. Returns comprehensive test results including pass/fail status, failure details, and browsing instructions. Large console output (>20 lines or >2KB) is automatically saved to a temporary file.

test_id.description: Optional test ID or index number to show details for a specific test

include_console.description: Whether to include console output and test activities (only used with test_id)

name: xcodemcp_xcresult_browser_get_console
description: Get console output and test activities for a specific test in an XCResult file. Large output (>20 lines or >2KB) is automatically saved to a temporary file.

test_id.description: Test ID or index number to get console output for

name: xcodemcp_xcresult_summary
description: Get a quick summary of test results from an XCResult file

name: xcodemcp_xcresult_get_screenshot
description: Get screenshot from a failed test at specific timestamp - extracts frame from video attachment using ffmpeg

test_id.description: Test ID or index number to get screenshot for

timestamp.description: Timestamp in seconds when to extract the screenshot. WARNING: Use a timestamp BEFORE the failure (e.g., if failure is at 30.71s, use 30.69s) as failure timestamps often show the home screen after the app has crashed or reset.

name: xcodemcp_xcresult_get_ui_hierarchy
description: Get UI hierarchy attachment from test. Returns raw accessibility tree (best for AI), slim AI-readable JSON (default), or full JSON.

test_id.description: Test ID or index number to get UI hierarchy for

timestamp.description: Optional timestamp in seconds to find the closest UI snapshot. If not provided, uses the first available UI snapshot.

full_hierarchy.description: Set to true to get the full hierarchy (several MB). Default is false for AI-readable slim version.

raw_format.description: Set to true to get the raw accessibility tree text (most AI-friendly). Default is false for JSON format.

name: xcodemcp_xcresult_get_ui_element
description: Get full details of a specific UI element by index from a previously exported UI hierarchy JSON file

hierarchy_json_path.description: Absolute path to the UI hierarchy JSON file (the full version saved by xcresult_get_ui_hierarchy)

element_index.description: Index of the element to get details for (the "j" value from the slim hierarchy)

include_children.description: Whether to include children in the response. Defaults to false.

name: xcodemcp_xcresult_list_attachments
description: List all attachments for a specific test - shows attachment names, types, and indices for export

test_id.description: Test ID or index number to list attachments for

name: xcodemcp_xcresult_export_attachment
description: Export a specific attachment by index - can convert App UI hierarchy attachments to JSON

test_id.description: Test ID or index number that contains the attachment

attachment_index.description: Index number of the attachment to export (1-based, from xcresult_list_attachments)

convert_to_json.description: If true and attachment is an App UI hierarchy, convert to JSON format
